short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Flashcards in the markdown language with a code editor

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
MemoAlgo is designed for effective learning and memorization of information. You can use it to prepare for an exam or an algorithmic interview. It is based on the Supermemo algorithm, which allows you to optimize the learning process and improve memorization.

● Create flashcards using Markdown formatting. You can add tables and images to the cards
● Add a text editor to the flashcard. This is especially convenient for memorizing and practicing algorithms.
● Use the method of interval repetition to consolidate information in memory. This allows you to effectively memorize information and store it in long-term memory.

Flashcards are stored in the browser's storage. You can export and import cards to transfer them to other devices.
